resources.string: Please scan the QR code on the left and download the Dongle according to the advices for android system mobile phone clients,then set the dongle router mode.
Step 1: Download apk to set network Or Simple key to Set the network manually!\n Step 2:Simple Key to next!
1.Mirror Dongle introduction \n By using the mirror Dongle, can make Android, IOS device push pictures, video and screen of the machine to TV, projector etc.

3.Double Connection mode 
 Two connection ways : AP , Router 
 AP : Hot spots generated by mirror's own dongle 
 Router : External router mirror dongle connection
4.Set the mirror dongle connect to external routing approach \n 1)Scan two-dimensional code, Download apk to set \n 2)Use the settings manually mouse
5.Mode of operation \n Use the Simple key to switch pages : DLNA,Airplay,Airmirror-> Miracast -> Setting -> Main -> DLNA,Airplay,Airmirror
